item.title: Building an Azure DevOps Copilot using .NET 8, Semantic Kernel and Azure OpenAI GPT-4o
item.description: This post demonstrates how to create an Azure DevOps Copilot that utilizes a small subset of the Azure DevOps REST API. To achieve this, we will be using Semantic Kernel along with .NET 8 and Azure OpenAI. Link to article: https://www.mytechramblings.com/posts/building-an-azure-devops-copilot-using-semantic-kernel-and-azure-openai/
